Translations.Text: Twa,Hha.	(Insiguro	y’izi	ndome	hamwe	n’uwufise	ubumenyi	bwazo n’Imana yonyene gusa)
Nti twakumanuriye iyi Qur’ani ntagatifu kugira ngo ugire amakenga
Ahubwo ikubere ubutumwa ku bantu bayigamburukira
N’imanurwa rivuye kuwaremye Isi n’Amajuru yadugijwe hejuru
Niyo Mana nyene imigisha n’inganji iri hejuru y’inyegamo yiwe nyeranda
Ibiri mu Majuru n’ibiri kw’Isi hamwe n’ibiri hagati yavyo hamwe n’ibiri hasi y’Isi vyose nirwiwe
Niwavuga	kw’ijwi	rininiya	mu	vy’ukuri	Imana	niyo	ifise	ubumenyi bw’amabanga hamwe nivyinyegeje cane biri mumbari
Imana, ntayindi isengwa mu vy’ukuri atari yo yonyene rudende	gusa, nayo niyo ifise amazina meza
Mbega warashikiwe n’ikiyago c’intumwa y’Imana Musa (iii)

Mugihe yabona umuriro aca abwira umuryango wiwe ati:- nimu rindire gatoyi mu vy’ukuri jewe nabonye umuriro kumbure ndaba zanira igishirira muri uwo muriro canke ndaza kuronka mwo uwundongora muri uwo muriro
Mugihe yashikayo yarahamagawe abwirwa ati:- ewe Musa (iii)
Ntankeka ni jewe Muremyi wawe, rero niwambure inkweto zawe mu vy’ukuri wewe uri mumwaba mutagatifu witiriwe Twuwaa
Nijewe nagutoye rero niwumvirize ubutumwa ushikirizwa
Mu vy’ukuri nijewe Mana, kuko ntayindi isengwa bimwe vy’ukuri atari jewe jenyene, rero nimunsenge kandi muhagarike amasengesho yose kandi mumpayagiza
Ntankeka umusi w’umuhero w’Isi uzoshika, nanje nkaba nshaka kuwunyegeza uwo musi kubigira mpaka kugira ngo umutima w’umwumwe wese urihwe kuvyo wakoze
Ntibakuzitire kuri ivyo, bamwe batavyemera nugukurikira ivyo imitima yabo yishakira, nawe ntuze urwe muruhombo
None ico kiri mukuboko kwawe kw’iburyo n’igiki ewe ntumwa y’Imana Musa (iii)
Intumwa y’Imana Musa (iii) ibishura iti:- iyi n’inkoni yanje negamira ko kandi niyo mpungurisha ivyatsi kubera ibitungwa vyanje, kandi nkayikoresha mubindi bikorwa
Imana ivuga iti:- nuyite hasi iyo nkoni yawe ewe ntumwa y’Imana Musa (iii)
Arayita hasi, mumwanya ica ihinduka inzoka yiruka cane
Imana ivuga iti:- nuyifate iyo nzoka kandi ntugire ubwoba, ubu rero duca tuyisubiza nkuko yamye aho hambere
Hanyuma ukurikize ukuboko kwawe mukwaha kwawe kuzoca kuvayo kwera derere atanabi gufise kukaba ari ikindi gitangaro kuri wewe
Kugira ngo tukwereke ibitangaro vyacu binini biniya
Nugende kwa Fir’auni, ntankeka niwe yarenze imbibe zagenywe
